step1.title: Select an API Plan
step1.subtitle: The API plan is corresponding to the service contract between you and the API.
step1.keyless: This plan is key-less and does not require subscription.

step2.title: Select an application
step2.subtitle: Application is the link between you, the consumer, and the subscription to an API plan.
step2.clientIdRequired: A clientId is required to subscribe to this plan. Please check your application's configuration.
step2.optionalMessage: Optional message to the API Owner
step2.describeUseApi: Describe your use case with this API
step2.hintAcceptTerms: By enabling the API key you accept the

step2CreateApplication.title: Create an application
step2CreateApplication.subtitle: The application is the link between you, the consumer and the activation of an API plan. Create your first app then refresh this screen.

apikey.key: You can access the API using the following API Key:

jwt.bearer: You have to get an access_token from the authorization server before being able to consume this API.

pending.title: Subscription is waiting for validation
pending.subtitle: Your subscription is still in pending state, you will receive a notification once processed.
pending.contactValidationProcess: Your request has been sent, we will contact you to inform about the validation process. Stay tuned to your email.
